Index.title: Next 15 Template with i18n and Shadcn UI
Index.description: A powerful starting point for your next multilingual, accessible web application.
Index.OmitRTLInstruction: To use OmitRTL, simply wrap the component you want to omit RTL support for with the OmitRTL component.

error.sorry: Sorry, we encountered an unexpected issue on our server.

Metadata.title: Next.js i18n Template - Multilingual Starter Template
Metadata.description: Next.js internationalization (i18n) starter kit with Armenian, Russian, and English support. Includes shadcn UI, theme switching, and RTL support.
Metadata.keywords: Next.js, i18n, internationalization, Armenian, Russian, English, multilingual, template, starter template, shadcn UI, RTL support
